column2: we had a bad experience with their delivery. We ordered a deep dish and a thin crust. We bit into the thin crust and - wait a minute - there's no meat! I was sharing a pizza with a meat lover and he immediately noticed the pepperoni's weren't there. We dug under the cheese and sauce
column3: but still the meat eluded us. We quickly called the pizzeria and spoke with the manager. He explained that they had burned our original pizza and had to make us a second one
column4: but that he was sure the pepperoni's we were added. We assured him they were not
column5: so he said he'd refund us for that pizza. I'll give an update if the refund actually goes through.
